description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军开国上将。曾任武汉军区司令员、中国人民解放军铁道兵司令员、第五届全国人大常委会委员、第六届全国政协副主席、中共中央顾问委员会委员等职。
description.en: A founding general of the People's Liberation Army of China. He served as the commander of the Wuhan Military Region, commander of the PLA Railway Corps, a member of the Standing Committee of the 5th National People's Congress, Vice Chairman of the 6th National Committee of the CPPCC, and a member of the Central Advisory Commission of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾存在的一个大军区，陈再道曾在此担任司令员。
description.en: A former major military region of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, where Chen Zaidao served as commander.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，1967年接替陈再道担任武汉军区司令员。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army who succeeded Chen Zaidao as commander of the Wuhan Military Region in 1967.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，由中国共产党领导。
description.en: A country in East Asia led by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国湖北省的县级市，是陈再道的出生地。
description.en: A county-level city in Hubei Province, China, and the birthplace of Chen Zaidao.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都，陈再道于此地逝世。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China, where Chen Zaidao passed away.

description.zh-cn: 陈再道的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Chen Zaidao.

description.zh-cn: 陈再道之子。1983年“严打”时被捕，次年被判处死刑。
description.en: Son of Chen Zaidao. He was arrested during the 1983 "Strike Hard" campaign and sentenced to death the following year.

description.zh-cn: 陈再道之子。
description.en: Son of Chen Zaidao.

description.zh-cn: 陈再道之子。
description.en: Son of Chen Zaidao.

description.zh-cn: 陈再道之女。
description.en: Daughter of Chen Zaidao.

description.zh-cn: 陈再道之女。
description.en: Daughter of Chen Zaidao.

en: Central Party School of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会轮训和培训中国共产党的高中级领导干部和马克思主义理论干部的学校。
description.en: The school that trains senior and mid-level leaders and Marxist theorists for the Communist Party of China.

en: General of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在1955年至1965年实行的军衔制度中的最高级别军衔。
description.en: The highest rank in the military ranking system of the People's Liberation Army from 1955 to 1965.

en: Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1927年至1937年间领导的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces led by the Communist Party of China between 1927 and 1937.

nodes.id: 国民革命军第十八集团军

zh-cn: 国民革命军第十八集团军

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共合作期间，由中国工农红军主力改编而成的中华民国国民革命军部队。
description.en: A unit of the National Revolutionary Army of the Republic of China, formed from the main forces of the Chinese Red Army during the Second United Front.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的主要国家武装力量。
description.en: The principal state armed forces of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1927年至1937年间，由中国国民党与中国共产党之间爆发的内战。
description.en: A civil war fought between the Kuomintang and the Communist Party of China from 1927 to 1937.

description.zh-cn: 1937年至1945年间，中华民国与大日本帝国之间发生的战争。
description.en: A war fought between the Republic of China and the Empire of Japan from 1937 to 1945.

description.zh-cn: 1945年至1950年间，由中国国民党与中国共产党之间爆发的内战，是第一次国共内战的延续。
description.en: A civil war fought between the Kuomintang and the Communist Party of China from 1945 to 1950, a continuation of the First Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 1927年由中国共产党在湖北黄安、麻城地区领导的武装起义。
description.en: An armed uprising led by the Communist Party of China in the Huang'an and Macheng areas of Hubei in 1927.

nodes.id: 鄂豫皖苏区反围剿战争

zh-cn: 鄂豫皖苏区反围剿战争

description.zh-cn: 第一次国共内战期间，中国工农红军为保卫鄂豫皖苏区抵抗国民革命军围剿的一系列战役。
description.en: A series of campaigns conducted by the Chinese Red Army to defend the Eyuwan Soviet Area against the encirclement campaigns of the National Revolutionary Army during the First Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的一次大规模军事转移和撤退行动。
description.en: A large-scale military transfer and retreat by the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

en: Fourth Army of the Red Army

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军第四方面军的主力部队之一，陈再道曾任该军军长。
description.en: One of the main forces of the Fourth Front Army of the Chinese Red Army, where Chen Zaidao served as its commander.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间八路军在河北南部设立的军区，陈再道曾任司令员。
description.en: A military region established by the Eighth Route Army in southern Hebei during the Second Sino-Japanese War, where Chen Zaidao served as commander.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间，八路军发动的一次大规模对日军的进攻。
description.en: A large-scale offensive launched by the Eighth Route Army against the Japanese army during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战期间中国人民解放军的主力部队之一，后发展为中原野战军。
description.en: One of the main forces of the People's Liberation Army during the Second Chinese Civil War, later developed into the Central Plains Field Army.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战初期，晋冀鲁豫军区部队在山西省上党地区对国民党军进行的一次战役。
description.en: A campaign conducted by the troops of the Shanxi-Hebei-Shandong-Henan Military Region against the Kuomintang army in the Shangdang area of Shanxi Province in the early stage of the Second Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战期间，晋冀鲁豫军区部队在河北省邯郸地区对国民党军进行的一次战役。
description.en: A campaign conducted by the troops of the Shanxi-Hebei-Shandong-Henan Military Region against the Kuomintang army in the Handan area of Hebei Province during the Second Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战期间，晋冀鲁豫野战军在陇海铁路沿线发起的一系列作战。
description.en: A series of operations launched by the Shanxi-Hebei-Shandong-Henan Field Army along the Longhai Railway during the Second Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战中“三大战役”之一，解放军在此战役中取得决定性胜利。
description.en: One of the "Three Great Campaigns" of the Second Chinese Civil War, in which the People's Liberation Army achieved a decisive victory.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军武装力量监察部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军武装力量监察部
en: Inspectorate of the People's Liberation Army Armed Forces

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期设立的军事监察机构，陈再道曾任副部长。
description.en: A military inspection agency established in the early days of the People's Republic of China, where Chen Zaidao served as Deputy Minister.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国历史上的一场政治运动，对中国社会造成了深远的影响。
description.en: A political movement in the history of the People's Republic of China that had a profound impact on Chinese society.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间发生在武汉的重大政治事件，导致时任武汉军区司令员陈再道等人倒台。
description.en: A major political event that occurred in Wuhan during the Cultural Revolution, leading to the downfall of then-Wuhan Military Region Commander Chen Zaidao and others.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军铁道兵

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军铁道兵

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾存在的一个兵种，负责铁路的修建、维护和保障任务。陈再道曾任该兵种司令员。
description.en: A former branch of the People's Liberation Army responsible for the construction, maintenance, and security of railways. Chen Zaidao served as its commander.

nodes.id: 第五届全国人大常委会

zh-cn: 第五届全国人大常委会
en: Standing Committee of the 5th National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 第五届中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the 5th National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第六届全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第六届全国委员会
en: 6th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的第六届全国委员会，陈再道曾任副主席。
description.en: The 6th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, where Chen Zaidao served as Vice Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1982年至1992年间设立的，旨在发挥资深干部经验的过渡性机构。
description.en: A transitional body established by the Communist Party of China from 1982 to 1992 to leverage the experience of senior cadres.

description.zh-cn: 1927年由毛泽东领导，在湖南、江西边界发动的一次武装起义。
description.en: An armed uprising launched in 1927 by Mao Zedong on the border of Hunan and Jiangxi.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，以其多变和投机行为著称。其部队曾被陈再道率部围攻。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China known for his frequent changes of allegiance and opportunistic behavior. His troops were once besieged by forces led by Chen Zaidao.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的早期高级领导人之一，曾与陈再道共同指挥部队参加百团大战。
description.en: One of the early senior leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who jointly commanded troops with Chen Zaidao in the Hundred Regiments Offensive.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军中将。在淮海战役中，其兵团被陈再道参与指挥的部队合围。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the Republic of China Army. During the Huaihai Campaign, his army group was encircled by forces co-commanded by Chen Zaidao.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军中将。在淮海战役中，其兵团曾被陈再道率部阻击。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the Republic of China Army. During the Huaihai Campaign, his army group was blocked by troops led by Chen Zaidao.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国十大元帅之一，曾盛赞陈再道“再道之勇”。
description.en: One of the Ten Marshals of the People's Republic of China, who once praised Chen Zaidao for his bravery.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在河南省设立的军事机构，陈再道曾任司令员。
description.en: A military organization established by the People's Liberation Army in Henan Province, where Chen Zaidao served as commander.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期设立的大军区之一，陈再道曾任副司令员。
description.en: One of the major military regions established in the early days of the People's Republic of China, where Chen Zaidao served as deputy commander.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。七·二〇事件发生时，他正在武汉，后紧急离开。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Liberation Army, and the People's Republic of China. He was in Wuhan when the Wuhan Incident occurred and had to leave urgently.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，文化大革命期间担任要职。在七·二〇事件中遭到“百万雄师”群众组织围攻。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China who held important positions during the Cultural Revolution. He was besieged by the "Million Heroes" mass organization during the Wuhan Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党理论家，中央文革小组成员。在七·二〇事件中遭到“百万雄师”群众组织围攻。
description.en: A theorist of the Communist Party of China and a member of the Central Cultural Revolution Group. He was besieged by the "Million Heroes" mass organization during the Wuhan Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首任国务院总理。在七·二〇事件中，他紧急前往武汉处理事态并搭救被围困的中央代表。
description.en: The first Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China. During the Wuhan Incident, he urgently went to Wuhan to handle the situation and rescue the besieged central representatives.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，时任武汉军区政治委员，在七·二〇事件后与陈再道一同被打倒。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, who was the political commissar of the Wuhan Military Region at the time. He was purged along with Chen Zaidao after the Wuhan Incident.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间武汉的一个群众组织，在七·二〇事件中围攻了中央代表团成员谢富治、王力等人。
description.en: A mass organization in Wuhan during the Cultural Revolution, which besieged central delegation members Xie Fuzhi, Wang Li, and others during the Wuhan Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾存在的一个大军区，陈再道在复出后曾在此担任副司令员。
description.en: A former major military region of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, where Chen Zaidao served as deputy commander after his political rehabilitation.

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生在中国北京的一系列学生和民众示威活动，最终以军队清场结束。据报道陈再道反对出动军队实行戒严。
description.en: A series of student and citizen demonstrations in Beijing, China in 1989, which ended with a military crackdown. Chen Zaidao reportedly opposed the imposition of martial law and the use of troops.

description.zh-cn: 1983年起在中国大陆展开的“严厉打击刑事犯罪活动”的简称，是一场大规模的社会治安整治运动。
description.en: An abbreviation for "Severe Crackdown on Criminal Activities" launched in mainland China from 1983, it was a large-scale campaign to improve public security.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，在陈再道之前担任中国人民解放军铁道兵司令员。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, who served as the commander of the PLA Railway Corps before Chen Zaidao.

description.zh-cn: 曾思玉接替陈再道担任武汉军区司令员。
description.en: Zeng Siyu succeeded Chen Zaidao as the commander of the Wuhan Military Region.

relationships.target: 国民革命军第十八集团军
鄂豫皖苏区反围剿战争
中国人民解放军武装力量监察部

description.zh-cn: 因被指支持“百万雄师”冲击中央代表团，陈再道被免去武汉军区司令员职务并遭受批斗迫害。
description.en: Accused of supporting the "Million Heroes" in their assault on the central delegation, Chen Zaidao was dismissed from his post as commander of the Wuhan Military Region and was subsequently persecuted.

description.zh-cn: 因被指支持“百万雄师”，时任武汉军区政委的钟汉华与陈再道一同倒台并遭受迫害。
description.en: Accused of supporting the "Million Heroes," Zhong Hanhua, then political commissar of the Wuhan Military Region, was purged along with Chen Zaidao and persecuted.

description.zh-cn: 在七·二〇事件中，“百万雄师”群众组织围攻了中央代表团成员谢富治。
description.en: During the Wuhan Incident, the "Million Heroes" mass organization besieged Xie Fuzhi, a member of the central delegation.

description.zh-cn: 在七·二〇事件中，“百万雄师”群众组织围攻了中央代表团成员王力。
description.en: During the Wuhan Incident, the "Million Heroes" mass organization besieged Wang Li, a member of the central delegation.

description.zh-cn: 在七·二〇事件中，周恩来紧急搭救了被围困的谢富治。
description.en: During the Wuhan Incident, Zhou Enlai urgently rescued the besieged Xie Fuzhi.

description.zh-cn: 在七·二〇事件中，周恩来紧急搭救了被围困的王力。
description.en: During the Wuhan Incident, Zhou Enlai urgently rescued the besieged Wang Li.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军铁道兵

description.zh-cn: 陈再道接替吴克华担任中国人民解放军铁道兵司令员。
description.en: Chen Zaidao succeeded Wu Kehua as the commander of the PLA Railway Corps.

relationships.target: 第五届全国人大常委会
中国人民政治协商会议第六届全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 1940年初，陈再道率冀南军区部队围攻国军石友三部。
description.en: In early 1940, Chen Zaidao led troops from the Southern Hebei Military Region to besiege the KMT troops of Shi Yousan.

description.zh-cn: 与宋任穷共同率领冀南部队参加百团大战。
description.en: Jointly led troops from Southern Hebei to participate in the Hundred Regiments Offensive with Song Renqiong.

description.zh-cn: 在淮海战役中，陈再道率部参与堵截合围黄维兵团。
description.en: During the Huaihai Campaign, Chen Zaidao led his troops to intercept and encircle Huang Wei's army group.

description.zh-cn: 在淮海战役中，陈再道率部参与阻击李延年兵团。
description.en: During the Huaihai Campaign, Chen Zaidao led his troops to block Li Yannian's army group.

description.zh-cn: 陈毅盛赞陈再道为“再道之勇”。
description.en: Chen Yi praised Chen Zaidao for his bravery.

description.zh-cn: 据报道，陈再道在六四事件中反对出动军队实行戒严镇压民众。
description.en: It is reported that Chen Zaidao opposed the use of troops and the imposition of martial law to suppress the populace during the June Fourth Incident.

description.zh-cn: 陈再道之子陈东平在1983年“严打”时被捕，并于1984年4月被判处死刑。
description.en: Chen Dongping, son of Chen Zaidao, was arrested during the 1983 "Strike Hard" campaign and sentenced to death in April 1984.
